Package arcade.env.comp

Class GraphSites.SiteNode

java.lang.Object
arcade.util.Graph.Node
arcade.env.comp.GraphSites.SiteNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
Enclosing class:
GraphSites
public static class GraphSites.SiteNode
extends Graph.Node
Extension of Graph.Node for site nodes.

Node tracks additional hemodynamic properties including pressure and oxygen.

See Also:
Serialized Form
